tasks.name: Weekly Dependency Audit
tasks.description: Check for outdated dependencies and security vulnerabilities

execution.command: Audit project dependencies: 1) Run npm audit or equivalent for security vulnerabilities, 2) Check for outdated packages, 3) Identify deprecated dependencies, 4) Create a summary report with recommended updates.

tasks.name: Weekly PR Triage
tasks.description: Review and triage open pull requests

execution.command: Review all open PRs: 1) List PRs older than 7 days, 2) Identify stale PRs needing attention, 3) Check for merge conflicts, 4) Suggest which PRs to prioritize for review.
